formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the configuration to be used for retrieving Admin Server's URL and credentials.

formElement.label: Wlst Script Absolute Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path to WLST. i.e: '/path/to/wlst.cmd' or 'wlst.sh'.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: Deployment name to assign to a newly-deployed application or standalone module. i.e: 'webapp'.

formElement.label: Application Path:
formElement.documentation: Absolute path of the application to deploy. i.e: '/path/to/webapp.war' or 'c:/mydir/webapp.war'.

formElement.label: Targets:
formElement.documentation: Targets on which to deploy the application or module (comma-separated list of the target servers, clusters, or virtual hosts).
